meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sulfurous.
meanings.sent1: The sulfurousnesses of the air after the lightning storm made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The sulfurousnesses of the hot springs attracted many tourists.
meanings.sent3: The sulfurousnesses of the rotten eggs filled the room with a pungent smell.
meanings.sent4: The sulfurousnesses of his temper flared up like a volcano.
meanings.sent5: The sulfurousnesses of the volcanic eruption painted the sky in fiery hues.

meanings.definition: The presence of sulfur or sulfur compounds.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the sulfurousnesses in the rock samples to understand the geological history.
meanings.sent2: The sulfurousnesses in the water indicated a potential volcanic activity nearby.
meanings.sent3: The sulfurousnesses in the air gave the town a distinct smell.
meanings.sent4: The sulfurousnesses of the chemical reaction created a cloud of noxious fumes.
meanings.sent5: The sulfurousnesses of the mine indicated a rich deposit of sulfur.
